title: Mini OBD2 GPS Tracker Real Time Vehicle Tracking Device OBD II Car Truck Locator
item_description:
Mini OBD2 GPS Tracker Real Time Vehicle Tracking Device OBD II Car Truck Locator
Description:
1. Precise positioning with an accuracy of 5 meters.
2. GPS+LBS+AGPS  three-mode positioning.
3. Waterproof, dustproof and drop-proof design.
4. Geo-fence alarm,Overspeed alarm, vibration alarm, displacement alarm,History Tracking Playback,Free Platform/APP,Real-time tracking by SMS/platform/APP
Features:
This device needs a SIM card, which not included and this GPS tracker for vehicles has worldwide coverage.
You can set Geofences that will alert you when the wearer has entered or exited defined areas to ensure the safety of your loved ones.
You can also set speed alert so you will get alerted if your vehicle exceeds a speed limit set by you.
Unlimited GPS tracking historical data saved during service, so you can check the historical data.
Wide application, suitable for most vehicles.
Easy to install, just plug and play.
Specification:
Type: OBD II GPS Tracker
Color: Black
Positioning: GPS+LBS+AGPS
Positioning: Accuracy:5 meters
Frequency: 850/900/1800/1900 MHz
Working: Temperature:-20~ +70 ° C
Working: Humidity:5~95%
Working: Voltage: DC 9-36V
Time to 1st fix(open sky):Cold status<35s,Hot status:<1s
Interface: 16PIN standard OBDII interface
SIM Card: the SIM card must be compatible with 2G GSM network, and must be Nano Size SIM  (not includes)
GPS Chipset: MTK high sensitivity chip 
Network: GSM/GPRS
GPS Protocol:Class 12,TCP/IP
Supported Operating Systems: For Android 2.3 or later, for iOS5.0 or later  
What's in the box:
1 x Car Tracker
Note:
1. This OBD GPS tracker is easy to use, plug, and play.
2. IMEI and ID numbers are exclusive numbers, which cannot be changed in the world. Only 2G GSM SIM cards can be used. It is not applicable to 3G or 4G and CDMA SIM cards.
3. The GPS tracker has a 16-pin standard interface that can be used in most cars. Most cars now have an OBD interface. If you don't know, please check the car.
4. If your SIM card has a PIN (the tracker cannot read the SIM card), unlock the SIM card on your phone.
How To Instell It? 
Install the device into the OBD interface of the car. In general, the OBD port is located in the driver or passenger cabin, from the edge of dash board on driver side to the border of 300mm. It is easy to touch by sitting in the driver's seat, the preferred location is within the area from steering post to the vehicle center-line.
How to log in mobile APP and web server?
1.Set APN
* Set the APN of device, then it will online tracking by platform
* If the device is already online after insert the SIM card, no need to set APN.
We have two ways to get the APN content of the device’s SIM card: Check the carrier on the internet or put the SIM card into cell phone to find out APN.
Set command:
APN,Apn name,Apn account,ApnPassword#
E. g:
If we got APN information below.
APN name:tim
APN username:brtim
APN password:tim
The SMS command: APN,123456,tim,brtim,tim#
If no APN name and APN password, no need input,  E.g: apn,123456,cmnet#
PAYMENT
SHIPPING
Return and Refund Policy
FEEDBACK
Help - Customer Support - Contac
We accept payment via PayPal. Use PayPal at checkout to pay with credit or debit.
Immediate payment is required. Shipping will be arranged within 1 business day once payment is cleared.

title: Car Radio Stereo For Kia Optima K5 2011-2015 Android 13 GPS Navi 48EQ Cam 4+32GB
item_description:
4+32GB Car Radio Stereo For Kia Optima K5 2011-2015 Android 13 GPS Navi 48EQ Cam
Features: 
●HD 9.1" 2.5D Capacitive touch screen   
●Wireless & Wired Carplay: wired or wireless Carplay in-vehicle system can closely integrate the user's iOS device and iOS experience with the dashboard system. Users who use wireless Carplay can connect to the car system via Bluetooth to realize voice-controlled navigation, make calls, send and receive messages, and listen to music.
● Wireless & Wired Android auto: wired or wireless Android auto in-vehicle system can closely integrate the user's Android device and Android experience with the dashboard system. Users who use wireless Android auto can connect to the car system via Bluetooth to realize voice-controlled navigation, make calls, send and receive messages, and listen to music. It is only available for Android phone（Android phones need to download android auto APP） .
●Built-in GPS Navigation: Users can purchase directly from play store for offline navigation. With wifi connected, Google Maps can be used perfectly, you can go anywhere you want and never get lost again.
●High definition 1080P: Full capacitance touch screen for easy operation, well designed user interface for car only.
●Built-in WIFI: Connect to WIFI, and you will find a new world，the most convenient one is the online map.
●Rear camera: support AHD high-definition 1080P camera image input.
●Hi-Fi function: High fidelity, reproduced sound highly similar to your original sound
●Steering wheel control: Through it you can control the functions you need by steering wheel, more convenient
●Built-in bluetooth with A2DP/Hands Free/Phone book:bluetooth hands-free calls,bluetooth music player,Auto loading phonebooks
●Double USB adapter input
●Support file manager: Support download, install and delete over thousands of android apps
●Support multilanguage: Support languages, up to 40 national languages
●You can enjoy music from you mobilephone without any cables, and also support USB connetion.
●FM Radio: Online music you can transfer the music to the car stereo by FM to enjoy the original car stereo sound,with 18 preset stations
●Time Setting:You can use the network or GPS to open the date and time automatically, or you can adjust it manually.
●Support external microphone

GPS:Support

camera: support

title: USB QC3.0 PD Type C Car Fast Charger Voltmeter Outlet Socket for 12V 24V Boat RV
item_description:
USB QC3.0 PD Type C Car Fast Charger Voltmeter Outlet Socket for 12V 24V Boat RV
Features:
【Newest 12V USB Outlet】- The 12v usb charger features a 20w pd usb c port, dual 18w qc3.0 usb charger, a digital voltmeter display and a button switch 
【USB-C 20W PD3.0】- The car accessories usb c car charger fast charging is equipped with a c type port which outputs 20W for 12V vehicles 
【Dual QC3.0 Ports】- The 12v usb outlet equips with 2 quick charge usb ports, simultaneously charge 2 devices. Total output 36W, 4x faster charging speed for compatible devices 
【LED Voltmeter and Button Switch】- The usb car charger with blue led digital voltmeter, help to monitor the battery of vehicle and let you know the health of battery while driving. Features a switch for the dual car charger adapter, turn it off when not in use to save the power of the vehicle battery
【Dust-proof Cover】- There is a rubber cover cap, dust-proof and water-resistant, protects internal circuit, effectively enhance its lifespan .
【Wide Application】- The plastic usb outlet with voltmeter fits for 12V/24V car, truck, boat, marine, golf cart, RV, ATV/UTV, etc. Compatible with all USB devices like cellphone, tablet, MP3/MP4, GPS, camera, etc.

title: Carpuride W702 Apple Carplay Android Auto Waterproof Touchscreen Dual Bluetooth
item_description:
Carpuride W702 Apple Carplay Android Auto Waterproof Touchscreen Dual Bluetooth

【Wireless CarPlay and Android Auto for Motorcycles】: Our carpuride W702 motorcycle carpaly has CarPlay or Android Auto functionality. By wirelessly connecting your smartphone to your motorcycle's touchscreen via Bluetooth, you can access map navigation, phone calls, music playback, text messaging, and more with the help of Siri or G00gle Assistant. Keeping your hands free allows you to focus on the road and ride safely.
【Built-in Dual Bluetooth】: Carpuride W702 Motorcycle GPS carplay features built-in Dual Bluetooth connectivity, pair the carplay touch screen with your smartphone and Bluetooth-enabled headphones or helmet, you can make hands-free calls or enjoy your favorite music, without take off your helmet. The convenience of dual Bluetooth seamless connection not only keeps your phone safely in your pocket but also allows you to enjoy a free riding experience.
【7" HD IPS Touch Screen】: The carplay screen for motorcycle is equipped with a 7-inch high-definition IPS touch screen with a resolution of 1024*600, making the visual effect more intuitive and the touch responsive. Vibrant 65K color and up to 1000nit peak brightness ，provide a clear and wonderful viewing experience even under bright outdoor sunlight, and include 64G TF cards.
【IP67 Waterproof & Anti-Theft Design】: IP67 Waterproof and Durable design, even if you ride in the rain or scorching sun, our motorcycle carplay screen can still be used normally, no need to worry about all kinds of weather! The Thief-proof detachable bracket design keeps the motorbike touch screen under control, providing you with higher security and convenience. It works flawlessly in a temperature range of -20°C to 70°C.
【Built-in EQ 】With its built-in preset EQ and user-customized 16-band HD EQ with 12 adjustable frequency sections, you can enjoy a wide variety of music styles and sound effects. when playing music through SD, and Bluetooth Music, click EQ,open or close "Loud" to turn on/off the bass effect, you can also choose the sound effect mode, rock, classical, jazz,and other sound effects.
【Two Power Connection Options】Using the motorcycle power line to provide 12V and 1A to the battery. The motorcycle's USB port provides a current of 5V and 2.5A or higher, use the USB boost cable to directly connect the W702 device to the motorcycle's USB port. The W702 has built-in reverse protection for convenience. Even if the cable is connected incorrectly, the device will not be damaged.
【Easy Installation, Suitable for All Motorcycles】: This portable motorcycle car screen comes with a bracket kit and tools for easy installation. Specially designed bracket kit and screw system with a safe and stable setup makes it easy to securely mount the screen on any motorcycle; (Simple wiring, ACC +12V and ground), NOTE: Not perfectly compatible with Samsung Note as well as S series. Before buy, please make sure your phone supports wireless carplay or wireless android auto.
【Customer Service & Products Included】: Carpuride customer service team will provide you with satisfactory after-sales service, if you have any problems in the process of using, please contact us by email or call the US customer service number, we will have professional staff to help you solve the problems. Products Included: 1x 7 inch Motorcycle carplay screen ,1x Power line, 1X USB Boost Cable,1x U-shaped Support, 1X64G TF, 1x Extension Rod, 1x User manual.
【Notice】: The accessory 64GTF card does not support software upgrades. It only supports storing music and videos for local playback. If you want to update software, please use a small capacity 32, 16, 8, 4GB card.
【Notice】: When using the motorcycle power line to supply power to the battery, ensure that the output voltage and current are 12V, 1A. If the USB port on the motorcycle outputs voltage and current less than 5V, 2A, it is not recommended to use the Carpuride moto to connect the USB boost line, as insufficient voltage or current may cause the motorcycle carplay screen to automatically shut down.


Use your iPhone or Android Smartphone, easily connected to our Carpuride Motorcycle Carpaly Screen via Bluetooth, you can not only enjoy music, making phone calls, but also stay focused on ride, Keep you ride safely and happily on the road！

Wireless CarPlay & Android Auto

Compatible with Wireless Apple CarPlay Compatible with Wireless Android Auto
The Motorcycle Carpaly support IOS system: Connect to your iPhone via Bluetooth wireless conenction, you easy to access your iPhone apps and features .With help of smart Siri voice assistant, you can make hands-free calls, play music, map navigation, and much more. The Motorcycle Carpaly support Android System: Connect to your phone via Bluetooth wireless conenction , allowing you easy to access your Android phone apps and features .With help of g00gle assistant, you can make hands-free calls, enjoy music, send and receive messages, map navigation.


How To Set Up Helmet and Headset ?


Pair your phone to the Motorcycle carplay screen via Bluetooth, pair the unit to your Bluetooth helmet/earphone, then you can adjust the volume and make hands-free calls by your helmet or earphone. Enjoy the freedom of seamless connectivity and enhanced functionality while riding.
